events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this product does not meet my needs.
The support system has classified this issue under the refund category based on the customer's message mentioning a refund request.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect product delivered to the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand that you received the wrong item and would like to help with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund request quickly?
Sure, my order number is 12345XYZ and I have attached a photo of the item that arrived, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email once completed.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate your help in resolving this issue so fast.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
We just wanted to check in and confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is now satisfactory.
As the refund issue has been resolved and confirmed by you, we are now closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
